official_title: A bill to designate the University College library, the University of Alabama in Birmingham, Ala., as a depository of Government publications.

summary.text: Designates the University College library, the University of Alabama in Birmingham, Alabama, as a depository of Government publications. (Amends 44 U.S.C. 1905)

titles.title: A bill to designate the University College library, the University of Alabama in Birmingham, Ala., as a depository of Government publications.
